item.title: Help with send message [PI] will rep++
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

[quote=“Acorn_, post:4, topic:419650”]Hope that is specific enough.

case ####: if(playerLevel[10] >= 70) { c.getPA().spellTeleport(2611,3396,0); c.sendMessage("You've teleported to the Fishing Guild."); } else if(playerLevel[10] < #){ c.sendMessage("You need a Fishing level of 70 or above to use this."); } break;[/quote]

Yeah it is thanks, but it still doesn’t say it, here’s my new code

} else if (c.teleAction == 21) { if((c.playerLevel[10] >= 70)) { c.getPA().spellTeleport(2611,3396,0); c.sendMessage("You've teleport to the Fishing Guild."); } else if((c.playerLevel[10] >= 69)) { c.sendMessage("You need a Fishing level of 70 or above to use this."); } break;

Read full topic

item.title: Help with send message [PI] will rep++
item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

You can add the tele actions your self, this is just the basics.

case ####: if(playerLevel[10] >= 70) { *whatever you want* } else if(playerLevel[#] < ##){ *unrequired level text* } break;

Read full topic

item.title: Help with send message [PI] will rep++
item.dc:creator: @Vhenom Vhenom
item.description:
@Vhenom wrote:

Okay so I’m trying to make my code tell you “you don’t have the correct fishing level to enter the fishing guild” when you click the button(9193)

Here is my code so far, could you guys help me make it so it says that when you don’t have 70 fishing? Thanks!

} else if (c.teleAction == 21) { if((c.playerLevel[10] >= 70)) { c.getPA().spellTeleport(2611,3396,0); c.sendMessage("You've teleport to the Fishing Guild."); } else if((c.playerLevel[10] >= 69)) { c.sendMessage("You need a Fishing level of 70 or above to use this."); } break;

*EDIT it still doesn’t tell you you need 70 fishing.

Read full topic
